entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
